etomica.modules.dcvgcmd

Class ConfigurationLatticeTube

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.config.ConfigurationLattice
      • etomica.modules.dcvgcmd.ConfigurationLatticeTube
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Configuration, java.io.Serializable

    public class ConfigurationLatticeTube
extends ConfigurationLattice
    Creates a configuration using a CubicLattice to specify positions. Has capability to assign lattice site to atoms when specifying their coordinates. See setAssigningSitesToAtoms method.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
